video.name: SPRING ROLL FRIED RICE BOWL 1 Pot 30 Mins | Vegan Richa Recipes
video.description:
Veggie Spring Rolls in Fried Rice Form! 1 Pot, 30 Min!
ðŸ”— FULL RECIPE: https://www.veganricha.com/2017/10/veggie-spring-rolls-fried-rice.html

Fridge clean up fried rice with cabbage, carrots, bell pepper, with rice or other cooked grains for a quick weeknight meal. Add some crisp Spring Roll wrappers as garnish! Vegan Gluten-free Nut-free Recipe. Easily Made oil-free. 

Deep fried Veggie Spring Rolls Deconstructed and tossed into rice to make a 1 pot meal. Veggies like thinly sliced cabbage, carrots and peppers are cooked lightly. Some soy sauce, ginger and garlic powder and black pepper adds flavor. You can use this veggie mixture to fill up spring roll or wonton wrappers and bake as well. More 1 POT Meals: https://www.veganricha.com/?s=1+pot

recipeIngredient: 3 tbsp low sodium soy sauce ( or tamari to make gluten-free)
1 tsp sugar (, 1/2 to 1 tsp to preference)
1 tsp vinegar (, rice or white vinegar)
2.5 to 3 cups cooked and cooled rice

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a saucepan over medium heat. Add the onion and garlic and cook until translucent. Add carrots and peppers and cook for 2 minutes. Add in the cabbage, 1/4 tsp salt and a good dash of black pepper and cover and cook for 2- 3 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat oil in a saucepan over medium heat. Add the onion and garlic and cook until translucent. Add carrots and peppers and cook for 2 minutes. Add in the cabbage, 1/4 tsp salt and a good dash of black pepper and cover and cook for 2- 3 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the sesame oil, sauces, and spices and mix in. Cook for a minute. Test the veggies for doneness to preference and cook longer if needed. (depends on the pan and stove etc)
recipeInstructions.name: Add the sesame oil, sauces, and spices and mix in. Cook for a minute. Test the veggies for doneness to preference and cook longer if needed. (depends on the pan and stove etc)

recipeInstructions.text: Mix in the rice, salt (depending on if the rice was already salted), and mix in. Cover and cook for 2 minutes. Fluff again, taste and adjust salt , heat and flavor adding more soy sauce and white pepper if needed. Add some red pepper flakes for heat if needed. Cover and let it sit for another 2 minutes before serving. Add some toasted wonton wrappers as garnish if you wish!
recipeInstructions.name: Mix in the rice, salt (depending on if the rice was already salted), and mix in. Cover and cook for 2 minutes. Fluff again, taste and adjust salt , heat and flavor adding more soy sauce and white pepper if needed. Add some red pepper flakes for heat if needed. Cover and let it sit for another 2 minutes before serving. Add some toasted wonton wrappers as garnish if you wish!
